channel.title: [Official Oldschool Server] Object interaction packet?
channel.description:
Im not sure where to ask about this but I figured there'd be someone on here who can answer my question.
I am trying to figure out how to make a client interact with an object (such as a door) using only packets. I have found that in revision 103, the packet I am interested in is opcode 202, which can be seen in the processAction method. Upon replicating this packet and sending it, nothing happens. However, sending a walk packet (opcode 12 in #103) will work as expected. Can anyone shed light on specifically how to make it interact?
